name: Zoom Meeting Transcript to Action Items Workflow

values.content: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract key decisions and action items with deadlines from meeting transcripts. Return structured JSON with: {"decisions": ["decision1", "decision2"], "action_items": [{"task": "description", "assignee": "person", "deadline": "YYYY-MM-DD"}]}

Analyze this meeting transcript and extract key decisions and action items with deadlines:

{{ $json.data }}
